name: Melancholic Star (Demo)
description:
The guards say that «he is a improper man, just a little weirdo»

The maids say that «she is such cute girl, just like a little doll»

They wonder if there is a place where it's ok just to be…

.

.

.

What are they? Who do they want to be?

There everything feels wrong so they want to go «home»

But where is «home»?

Would be confortable there?

 

Thinking is tiring so they wish to sleep

-Demo Content-

Already 100+ little drawings

Animation~

5 or so minutes of prologue

An outline of my plans

Choices that don't matter

Classical music that is CC0 and PD but youtube may copy strike anyway
 

-Content Warnings-

Gender stuff

for the future

Depression and the wish of not being... anymore

Abuse
